I love attending events at the smaller venue. Beautiful sunsets to enjoy over the tower bridge. Really good food. Inexpensive family fun when you attend a River Cats Game.
We spend so many summer nights here. Great venue for baseball and so much more. The atmosphere is family-friendly, clean and welcoming.
